amendment.description: An amendment to require the bill to be reported back to the House with an amendment inserting prohibition on contracts to educational institutions not supporting U.S. defense efforts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the bill to be reported back to the House with an amendment inserting prohibition on contracts to educational institutions not supporting U.S. defense efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oversight and Government Reform amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Oversight and Government Reform amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Oversight and Government Reform amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
